name: Base Camp Hill Chart
description:
What is this?

It’s a hill chart used to track the progress of scopes. Read about them here:

 https://basecamp.com/shapeup/3.3-chapter-11 (Scopes)

https://basecamp.com/shapeup/3.4-chapter-12 (Hill charts)


How to use this?

Define scope - change text “Scope name” to the name of the new scope.

Track progress - move scope’s marker along the hill.

See progress - open “Show version history” in Figma.
